tool_description: Finds and ranks the best meeting times based on participant availability, preferences, and scheduling constraints using optimization algorithms.

available_slots.description: Array of available time slots from availability analysis

preference_scores.description: Preference scores for each time slot (0-1 scale)

prioritize_timezone_fairness.description: Whether to prioritize fairness across timezones

max_results.description: Maximum number of optimal times to return

optimization_criteria.description: Primary optimization criteria: availability, preferences, timezone_fairness, or balanced

avoid_early_morning.description: Avoid scheduling before 8 AM in any participant's timezone

avoid_late_evening.description: Avoid scheduling after 6 PM in any participant's timezone

minimum_score_threshold.description: Minimum optimization score for returned results (0-1 scale)

error_messages: Invalid available slots: Each slot must be a properly formatted time range string.
Invalid duration: required_duration_minutes must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Invalid timezones: One or more timezone identifiers are not recognized.
Mismatched array lengths: preference_scores length must match available_slots length when provided.
Invalid preference scores: All scores must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid optimization criteria: Use one of [availability, preferences, timezone_fairness, balanced].
Invalid score threshold: minimum_score_threshold must be between 0 and 1.
No optimal times found: No time slots meet the specified criteria and threshold.
usage: Provide available_slots, required_duration_minutes, and participant_timezones. Optionally configure optimization parameters like preference_scores, optimization_criteria, and constraints. Returns ranked optimal meeting times with scores.

optimal_times.description: Array of optimal meeting times ranked by score

optimization_scores.description: Optimization scores for each recommended time (0-1 scale)

timezone_impact_analysis.description: Analysis of how each time affects different timezones

recommendation_summary.description: Summary explaining why these times were selected

alternatives_considered.description: Total number of time slots evaluated
